cosmicProfile.description: Use this data to generate the Cosmic Story narration

zodiacMeaning.sun_gemini: The Communicator - intellectual curiosity, adaptability, dual nature of creator and analyst
zodiacMeaning.moon_libra: Emotional harmony seeker, values balance, diplomatic in relationships
zodiacMeaning.rising_scorpio: Presents as intense, magnetic, transformative presence to the world

numerologyMeaning.lifePath4: The Builder - methodical, disciplined, creates lasting foundations for humanity
numerologyMeaning.birthNumber2: The Diplomat - partnership-oriented, sensitive to others, bridge between worlds
numerologyMeaning.destinyNumber7: The Seeker - spiritual depth, analytical mind, pursuer of hidden truths

cosmicProfile.synthesis: A Gemini sun's intellectual versatility combined with Libra moon's emotional equilibrium, projected through Scorpio rising's transformative intensity. Life Path 4 builds the structures that Destiny 7 fills with meaning, while Birth Number 2 ensures the work serves connection between beings.

Hero.motto: Where there's a will, there's a way
Hero.coreDesire: To prove worth through courageous acts
Hero.goal: Expert mastery that improves the world
Hero.strategy: Be as strong and competent as possible

Creator.motto: If you can imagine it, it can be done
Creator.coreDesire: To create things of enduring value

Magician.coreDesire: Understanding fundamental laws of the universe
Magician.strategy: Develop a vision and live by it

mission.primary: To raise the conscious awareness of the human race
mission.vision: A world where humanity consciously shapes its future, free from war, famine, disease
mission.thesis: Data-driven decisions towards self-determined behavioral change in pursuit of self-actualization

coreBeliefs: Humanity is transitioning from unconsciously crafting its future to consciously shaping it
The purpose of everything in reality is to serve others
We are the creators of our future
The extent of suffering is inversely related to quality of living conditions
Data-driven decisions enable self-determined behavioral change
philosophy.approach: Biomimicry of the human body - coordinating systems harmoniously

origin.summary: Born in Kenya, moved to America at age 14 when mother returned after 11 years. True awakening in 2012 - discovered life's purpose. Japan trip expanded worldview beyond national boundaries.

keyMoments.event: Reunited with mother, moved to America
Japan trip - realized humanity is a single organism

restrictions.reason: Caffeine can interfere with psilocybin effects

pillars.presence: Being in the now, not past-ruminating or future-anxious
pillars.awareness: Noticing thought patterns, cognitive biases, blind spots
pillars.integration: Embodying insights into daily action and behavior

rca.thesis: The more I breathe, the more I'm aware, the more I'm present, the more I raise my conscious awareness. Objective reality lies within.

considerations.progressionStyle: Linear progression on compounds, volume progression on accessories

proteinTarget.notes: Minimum 150g daily, tracked via experiment targets

mealTiming.postworkout: Protein shake within 30 min, full meal within 2 hours
